notes_de: V40 FULL: ReaInsert + Pedals + VST/JSFX ONLY from installed-sync list. No Rea* FX. Adds pre_fx_chain (before hardware) and post_fx_chain (after return). Sonicake Portal parallel option annotated. V43: Adds hardware_parallel (Sonicake Portal Loop A/B) and pedal fx_loop sub-chains (Attack Decay, Deluxe Memory Boy). Wizard displays A/B and fx_loop inserts. V44: Adds Monster presets combining Portal A/B + pedal FX loops. Adds patch_instructions_de and Wizard 'Copy patch instructions'. V45: Adds non-Melda IDM presets (Field/Drums/Synth/Drones) using installed VST/JSFX only; explicitly excludes Melda plugins. V46: Adds explicit Sonicake Portal Loop A/B routing and patch instructions to V45 presets.

use_cases.description_de: Digitale Artefakte, rhythmische Zerstörung, Ringmod & verbogene Delays.
LoFi-Färbung plus großer Raum, stereo und musikalisch.
ReaInsert + Patchbay: DAW → Pedale → zurück, mit sicheren Gain-Stages.
Einzelhits & Geräusche in mixbare IDM-Hits, Glitches & Texturen verwandeln (ReaInsert → Pedale → Reaper FX).
Einzelhits (Foley) in druckvolle, einzigartige IDM-Drums verwandeln: Pre-VST → ReaInsert → Pedale → Post-VST.
Ambience/Noise zu kontrollierten Texturen für IDM, mit Ducking, Width und Supermassive tails.
Metallische Objects → inharmonik + ringmod + gated space, aber mixbar.
Metallische Field Hits zu tonal/resonant/robotic Sounds.
Textur-Beds und Drones mit Valhalla + Glitchmachines + Kilohearts (ohne Melda).
Synths durch Hardware + Glitch/Transient Tools (ohne Melda).

presets.name_de: Glitch/IDM FX Chaos (Parallel Send)
presets.signal_flow_de: Drums/FX Send → Bitcrush → Dripping Delay → Ringmod → Reverb (kurz) → zurück

recommended_routing.notes_de: Dry bleibt in Reaper; FX-Chain als Return (100% wet oder Mix hoch).

steps.note_de: Kurzes Delay mit Repeats nah an Self‑Osc; Time drehen für Pitch‑Bends.
Inharmonik/Metall; Frequency auf Key oder bewusst daneben.

presets.schema_notes_de: V40: no Rea* FX. VST/JSFX chosen from installed sync list.

pre_fx_chain.notes_de: Pre-shaping BEFORE hardware so pedals react to a tighter signal.
Gentle leveling before hardware to stabilize gain staging.

post_fx_chain.notes_de: Band-limit return so glitch FX sits in mix.
IDM-style chops; automate threshold for rhythm.
Optional micro-space; turn off if too busy.

parallel_splitter.note_de: Wenn sinnvoll: Portal als Parallel-Splitter nutzen (Dry/Wet Blend am Hardware-Switch). Für Return: Wet 100% zurück, Dry im Reaper behalten.

recommended_routing.notes_de: Als Insert auf Drum-Bus oder nur Snare-Track. Gate-Reverb besser post-EQ.

steps.note_de: Push in Sweet Spot, dann wieder Pegel fangen.

presets.patch_instructions_de:
PATCH (ReaInsert → Portal → Return):
1) ReaInsert SEND L/R → Sonicake Portal INPUT L/R
2) Portal OUTPUT L/R → ReaInsert RETURN L/R

PORTAL LOOP A (Envelope/Grains):
3) Portal FX SEND A → Attack Decay INPUT
4) Attack Decay OUTPUT → Portal FX RETURN A
5) Attack Decay FX SEND → AMO-3 INPUT → AMO-3 OUTPUT → UT300 INPUT → UT300 OUTPUT → Attack Decay FX RETURN

PORTAL LOOP B (Living Delay/Tails):
6) Portal FX SEND B → Deluxe Memory Boy INPUT
7) Memory Boy OUTPUT → Portal FX RETURN B
8) Memory Boy FX SEND → VP1 INPUT → VP1 OUTPUT → Ginean Ringmod INPUT → Ringmod OUTPUT → Memory Boy FX RETURN

TIP:
- Portal Mix: starte Loop A/B jeweils leise (10–20%) und taste dich hoch.
- Resample 30–60s Return, dann slicen (IDM workflow).

presets.name_de: MONSTER: Metal Ring (Loop A) + Memory Boy FX-Loop (Loop B)
presets.signal_flow_de: Metal hits → pre focus → ReaInsert → Portal A metal character + Portal B living delay tails → Return → post control

recommended_routing.notes_de: Für Klicks/Pops: Loop A dominant, Loop B leise. Für Drones: Loop B hoch, Loop A moderat.

pre_fx_chain.notes_de: Pre-shaping BEFORE hardware so pedals react to a tighter signal.
Gentle leveling before hardware to stabilize gain staging.

post_fx_chain.notes_de: Band-limit return so glitch FX sits in mix.
IDM-style chops; automate threshold for rhythm.
Optional micro-space; turn off if too busy.

steps.note_de: Metallischer Ton; Freq auf Song-Key für tonal perc.
Kurz für Ghosts oder lang für Drones.

presets.patch_instructions_de:
PATCH:
ReaInsert SEND → Portal INPUT; Portal OUTPUT → ReaInsert RETURN

Loop A:
Portal FX SEND A → AMO-3 → Ringmod → Portal FX RETURN A

Loop B:
Portal FX SEND B → Deluxe Memory Boy → Portal FX RETURN B
Memory Boy FX SEND → ISET Flanger → Mooer LoFi → Memory Boy FX RETURN

TIP:
- Klicks/Pops: Loop A 20–40%, Loop B 5–15%
- Drones: Loop B 20–50%, Loop A 10–25%
